title: Auxiliary Field Formulation of Supersymmetric Nonlinear Sigma Models
abstract: Two dimensional N=2 supersymmetric nonlinear sigma models on hermitian symmetric spaces are formulated in terms of the auxiliary superfields. If we eliminate auxiliary vector and chiral superfields, they give D- and F-term constraints to define the target manifolds. The integration over auxiliary vector superfields, which can be performed exactly, is equivalent to the elimination of the auxiliary fields by the use of the classical equations of motion.
